pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Tihomir Surdilovic tsurdilo@redhat.com
Many thanks for submitting your Pull Request ❤️!
@ricardozanini
This PR aligns the kogito SW parsing with the latest of the specification
Updated parsing and generation code to work with the latest Switch state
Updated all examples and tests so the json and yaml use the latest spec definitions
I will do the associated PR for kogito-examples tomorrow.

nodes.bodyText: I am seeing a few of these imports java.io.IOException in these classes, but I don't think the exception is actually thrown, you can probably remove them.
I wish we will be able to revisit some of this codegen in the near future. String concat is a bit error-prone this way
+1, would be good to have some way to at least hide this inside a utility method.
maybe do a more specific import?

I think you can try something like the code below to avoid the roundtrip to String and back.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        String jsonString = jsonObjectMapper.writeValueAsString(workflow);
          
          
            
                        JsonNode jsonNode = jsonObjectMapper.valueToTree(workflow)
